Class Inventory ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
size

integer The size of the inventory
selected

integer The selected slot in the inventory (hotbar)
Functions
_acp_Inventory.armor()

The armor inventory
_acp_Inventory.offhand()

The item in the second hand
_acp_Inventory.at()

The item in slot or nil

 --proper iteration (checking for nil for every item you get)
for i=1,inventory.size do
	local item = inventory.at(i)
	if item ~= nil then
		print(item.name)
	end
end
player.inventory()

Gets the inventory of the player

The item in slot or nil

 --proper iteration (checking for nil for every item you get)
for i=1,inventory.size do
	local item = inventory.at(i)
	if item ~= nil then
